title: install in Python interface fails to "install" submodule
body:
Installed top level super-dataset (`///indi/fcon1000`) and tried to install sub-dataset but failed in Python, while worked in shell:

``` ipython
In [13]: install('fcon1000/Ontario/')
2016-07-25 14:04:22,403 [INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/home/yoh/pymvpa2_tutorial/fcon1000/Ontario> (install.py:375)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
RuntimeError                              Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-13-8069745f64a8> in <module>()
----> 1 install('fcon1000/Ontario/')

/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/distribution/install.pyc in __call__(dataset, path, source, recursive, add_data_to_git)
    391                     lgr.debug("Retrieving a dataset from URL: {0}".format(source_url_))
    392                     with swallow_logs():
--> 393                         vcs = Install._get_new_vcs(ds, source_url_)
    394                     break  # do not bother with other sources if succeeded
    395                 except GitCommandError:

/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/distribution/install.pyc in _get_new_vcs(ds, source)
    661         if source is None:
    662             raise RuntimeError(
--> 663                 "No `source` was provided. To create a new dataset "
    664                 "use the `create` command.")
    665         else:

RuntimeError: No `source` was provided. To create a new dataset use the `create` command.

In [14]: !ls -ld fcon1000/Ontario/
drwx--S--- 2 yoh yoh 4096 Jul 25 14:03 fcon1000/Ontario/

*In [15]: !ls -la fcon1000/Ontario/
total 8
drwx--S---  2 yoh yoh 4096 Jul 25 14:03 .
drwx--S--- 39 yoh yoh 4096 Jul 25 14:03 ..

In [16]: 
```

``` shell
[1]  + 8398 suspended  ipython
(venv-tests) 2 15044 ->148 [1].....................................:Mon 25 Jul 2016 02:05:11 PM EDT:.
hopa:~/pymvpa2_tutorial
$> datalad install fcon1000/Ontario 
2016-07-25 14:05:17,548 [INFO   ] Installing /home/yoh/pymvpa2_tutorial/fcon1000/Ontario (install.py:375)
2016-07-25 14:05:17,626 [INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/home/yoh/pymvpa2_tutorial/fcon1000/Ontario> from http://datasets.datalad.org/indi/fcon1000/Ontario/.git (install.py:375)
1 installed item is available at
<Dataset path=/home/yoh/pymvpa2_tutorial/fcon1000/Ontario>
```

and after that "installs" it fine within Python:

``` ipython
$> fg
[1]  + 8398 continued  ipython



In [16]: install('fcon1000/Ontario/')
2016-07-25 14:07:29,706 [INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/home/yoh/pymvpa2_tutorial/fcon1000/Ontario> (install.py:375)
Out[16]: <Dataset path=/home/yoh/pymvpa2_tutorial/fcon1000/Ontario>
```
